data.summary: Bunge was the 2nd largest importer of soy from BRAZIL in 2017, accounting for 13.0 million tons. This is a 9% increase vs the previous year. As an importer, Bunge sources from 397 municipalities, or 17% of the soy production municipalities. The main destination of the soy imported by Bunge is China, accounting for 53% of the total.
